name: ZNUMBERZ
description:
Simple but challenging numbers game.

Every tile on the board is labeled with a number between 1 and 4.
The tile may only be moved by that amount on free positions.
Your goal is to move all tiles once.

Featuring 4 game modes:

* The original 10 levels made by Karl Bartel
* 50 really hard levels generated by the AI
* Daily levels, a collection of 20 levels which changes every day
* Time attack mode with easy levels to solve quickly

------------------------------------------------------

TECH SPECS

------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.16.2

Physics engine: none

Lines of code: 582

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code. Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
